wikitext.*:
'''RIG''' is a [[Common Eldarin]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "twine, wreathe"<ref name=Shibb>{{PM|Shibboleth}}, p. 347 (root appearing as "RIG")</ref> or "wreath, garland, crown".<ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 59 (root appearing as "√RIG-")</ref> A detailed signification is given as "twine, especially of flower-garlands, or those of gems etc. made in their likeness".<ref name=Eld>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 182 (root appearing as "√RIG-")</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''-rīna'' ("garlanded, crowned"); ''[[rië]]'' ("garland"); ''riende''<ref name=Eld/>

*[[Primitive Quendian]]: ''rīgā'' ("wreath, garland")<ref name=Shibb/>
**[[Quenya]]: ''[[ría]]''<ref name=Shibb/>
**[[Telerin]]: ''[[ría]]''<ref name=Shibb/>
**[[Sindarin]]: ''rî''<ref name=Shibb/>

==Other versions==

In the ''[[The Etymologies|Etymologies]]'' appears the root RIG, with the descendant forms [[Quenya]] ''[[rië|ríe]]'' ("crown") and [[Noldorin]] ''[[rhî]]'' ("crown") and ''[[rhîs]]'' ("queen").<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 383 (root appearing as "RIG-")</ref><ref name=VT>{{VT|46a}}, p. 11</ref>
